On Time

Public transportation BusApp.
Find out what is the next bus arriving as easy as 1 click.
See app in action

Project Overview

Problem statement - Busy bus transportation companies just added more bus routes to the city transport system, and many of those routes fall on the same station. The high volume of riders gets confused about how much time they need to get to a bus stop and what next bus is arriving.

Duration - 4 weeks.

Tools - Figma

Year - 2021

Discovery and research

User surveys
In order to better understand my target audience and to get a sense of user behavior,
I created a simple survey, and here are the main findings.

Survey participants habits:

30% - use bus once a month,

25% - use bus 2-3 times a week,

20% - use bus every day

App that participants use:

88,2% - Google maps,

11,8% - Transit,

5,9% - Moovit

Information that they value the most:

37,8% - Accurate schedule,

42,2% - Travel time,

20% - Time to get to the bus stop

Competitive analysis
According to survey results most users use the mobile app to plan their trip.
To determine the strengths and weaknesses of competitors I have done a competitive
analysis using SWOT method for the Moovit and Transit apps.

User persona
I created a user persona that includes two different user types: student Chandler and Monica.
What are their frustrations? What features do they find essential when using the app?
Personas helped me to represent a target user groups of my app and keep my design decisions user-centered.

Information architecture

User stories
User stories will give a more realistic understanding of the user's goals.
I created some for returning and new users and classified them by priority.
